TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientAccessTokenRequest extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ComplexProperty

Docs.summary: Represents a client token access request for a mail app for Outlook.The class is applicable for clients that target Exchange Online and versions of Exchange starting with Exchange Server 2013.

remarks.para: The class is used with the method to request client access tokens for mail apps for Outlook.

Docs.param: The app identifier for the app requesting a client access token.
The scope of the requested client access token. This parameter is only applicable if the value of the parameter is ClientAccessTokenType.ScopedToken.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an app identifier, a token type, and a scope.
